/usr/bin/clang++ -g -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.3.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/YourTargetName.dir/main.cpp.o -o YourTargetName  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/lib /opt/homebrew/lib/libsfml-graphics.2.6.1.dylib /opt/homebrew/lib/libsfml-window.2.6.1.dylib /opt/homebrew/lib/libsfml-system.2.6.1.dylib
